description: This table stores information for each Image Database (IMD) record. This can be check-level or claim-level, and is indicated in column IMD_TYPE_C.

columns.name: IMAGE_ID
columns.description: This is the ID for the remittance image record. A separate remittance image record is created for each invoice payment.

columns.name: CREATION_DATE
columns.description: The date when the remittance image record was created (i.e., when the electronic file was loaded and created).

columns.name: SERVICE_AREA_ID
columns.description: The service area of the invoice to which this remittance payment was posted.

columns.name: PAYMENT_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The posting method by which this remittance record was created (manual or through electronic remittance).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Remittance


Manual payment posting

columns.name: PAYMENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The payment type for this remittance record (self-pay or insurance).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Insurance payment


Self-Pay

columns.name: PAYMENT_AMOUNT
columns.description: Total amount paid by the payer in the remittance file.

columns.name: CREDIT_DEBIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Code indicating whether payment amount is a credit or debit.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Credit


Debit

columns.name: PAYMENT_MTD_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Code identifying the method for the movement of payment instructions.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Automated Clearing House


Financial Institution Option


Check


Federal Reserve Funds or Wire Transfer


Non-Payment Data

columns.name: PAYMENT_FMT_CD_C_NAME
columns.description:
Code identifying the payment format used.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Cash Concentration/Disbursement plus Addenda (CCD+) (ACH)


Corporate Trade Exchange (CTX) (ACH)

columns.name: SENDER_ID_QUAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Sender ID qualifier. Code identifying the type of identification number of Depository Financial Institution (DFI).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


ABA Transit Routing Number with check digits


Canadian Bank Branch and Institution Number

columns.name: SENDER_IDN_NUM
columns.description: Sender Depository Financial Institution (DFI) identification number from the remittance file.

columns.name: ISSUE_DATE
columns.description: Check issue date or Effective Entry Date for electronic fund transfers.

columns.name: TRACE_TYP_CD_C_NAME
columns.description:
Code identifying which transaction is being referenced.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Current Transaction Trace Numbers

columns.name: REF_IMG_ID
columns.description: Reference remittance record for general remittance file information.  A separate remittance image record is created for each invoice payment in the remittance file. The general check level information is stored in the first remittance image record and subsequent image records hold the image ID of that record in this item.

columns.name: GRP_REF_ID
columns.description: Reference remittance image record for Provider Summary Information and Provider Supplemental Summary Information.  A separate remittance image record is created for each invoice payment in the remittance file.  Multiple invoice payments can share the same Provider Summary Information and Provider Supplemental Summary Information. This information is stored in the first remittance image record. Subsequent image records hold the image ID of the original remittance image in this item.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient from the invoice to which the payment in the remittance image record is posted.

columns.name: CLM_START_DATE
columns.description: The starting date of the claim that was sent out to the payer.

columns.name: CLM_END_DATE
columns.description: The ending date of the claim that was sent out to the payer.

columns.name: CLP_ID
columns.description: Internal ID of the claim record (for Hospital Billing only).

columns.name: IMD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies the type of Remittance Image. 1 is Check Level and 2 is File Level.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Check Level IMD


Invoice IMD

columns.name: INTER_CTRL_NUM
columns.description: Holds the Interchange Control Number from the electronic remittance file.

columns.name: GROUP_CTRL_NUM
columns.description: Holds the Group Control Number from the electronic remittance file.
